name: Rosy
description:
Mini Jam 63: Future.

Your goal is to hold out for a minute at each level with robots and traps. The auto-aiming cannon and your legs will help you.

Have fun! /

*Tip: Stand on the green square and click "e" to start the level.

Control:

w, a, s, d --> move,

left_shift --> run,

space --> dash.
